## EditBox class

Represents an operation that edit the contents of a box

**Signature:**

```typescript
/** @sealed */
export declare class EditBox extends EditBoxBase implements EditBoxProps 
```
**Extends:** EditBoxBase

**Implements:** [EditBoxProps](./scribing.editboxprops.md)
